Head: Very impatient, cross, and irritable
FACE WRINKLED AND OLD-LOOKING
Frontal headache, with ENLARGED FEELING OF EYES
Fever: Feels a glow all over, like being over steam; CHILLY, while sitting beside the fire
Stomach: Cannot retain urine; must attend to the call without delay
Scanty with frequent urging, with pressure on bladder and burning in urethra
Flow stops suddenly followed by pain Urine foul
Intense nausea, with vomiting, purging, and faintness
Back: Aches, weak; drawing of muscles below scapulae
Mouth: Sensation of a thread in throat
Female: Leucorrhoea, profuse, foul, staining a greenish yellow; stains of menses and leucorrhoea very hard to wash out
